summary: A Romanian police officer teams up with a small crew of old friends from the World War II Jewish Resistance to pull off a heist by convincing everyone at the scene of the crime that they are only filming a movie.
cast: Vera Farmiga|Mark Strong|Harry Lloyd|Anton Lesser|Joe Armstrong|Christian McKay|Tim Plester|Darrell D'Silva|David de Keyser|Frances Cuka|Marcin Walewski|Allan Corduner|Monica Barladeanu|Paul Jesson|John Henshaw|Martin Hancock|Ed Gaughan|Martin McDougall|Stuart McQuarrie|Andrew Buckley|Ionut Grama|Smaranda Luna|Laura Cosac|Serban Pavlu|Ionut Burlan|Radu Caranfil|Orlando Petriceanu|Cosmin Nedelcu|George Remes|Ioan Cortea|Alan O'Silva|Relu Poalelungi|Silviu Geamanu|Daniel Popa|Felix Dumitrescu|Augustin Pop|Sorin Godi|Marius Damian|Gabriel Constantin|Corneliu Ulici|Radu Iacoban|Andrei Mateiu|Dan Radulescu|Laurentiu Bãnescu|Cosmin Dominte|Simona Pop|Silviu Biris|Irina-Halina Cornisteanu|Gheorghe Ifrim|Gabriela Butuc|Tudor Caranfil|Vlad Zamfirescu|Corneliu Jipa|Radu Bânzaru|Mihai Niculescu|Andreea Vulpe|Liudmila Anton|Marius Florea Vizante|John Riley|Eduard-Mihai Carlan|Edgar Nistor|Florin Penisoara|Conrad Mericoffer|Ioana Chitu|Bogdan Cotlet|Paul Ipate|Stefan Huluba|Lorena Luchian|Julian Vasile|Marius Dinca|Vlad Jipa|Theodor Delciu|Cristian Bota|George Burcea|Mihai Cojocaru|Grant Gillespie|Gwyneth Keyworth|Isaiah Michalski
keywords: romanian|police officer|year 1959|bucharest romania|post world war two
title: Closer to the Moon
